document.full_text: lawmakers will clash this week over strategies for combating high gasoline prices and repealing tax incentives enjoyed by big oil companies, but there is little chance of a breakthrough for drivers.
document.title: congress to see more theatrics over high oil
lines_and_colors: lawmakers will clash this week over strategies for combating high gasoline prices and repealing tax incentives enjoyed by big oil companies, but there is little chance of a breakthrough for drivers.
